txt.en:
The bounty notice reads:

Some bog-lurkers have been spotted in the area, and we can not risk our scouts getting preyed upon by these beasts.

We are in need of someone to do something about them. If you do, report back to Zûfan here in Jadambor and you will be rewarded for your efforts.

They can be dangerous. You may want to bring some companions.
Inform Zûfan in Jadambor that you have defeated bog-lurkers in the area.
Inform Zûfan in Jadambor that you have defeated bog-lurkers in the area
A bounty has been posted to reduce the number of bog-lurkers in the area.

You inform Zûfan about the completed bounty.

'That is great to hear. Our scouts will be relieved to hear the news and can worry about looking over their shoulders a little less thanks to you.

'Be sure to check the board for more requests, we need all the help we can get down here.'
You accepted a bounty notice asking you to reduce the number of bog-lurkers near Jadambor to help make the roads safer.
Informed Zûfan of the completed bounty
